trans-unit.source: Provides methods to add work to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: 提供将工作添加到工作批次的方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Services use this interface to add pending work to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服务使用此接口将挂起的工作添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a pending work item to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: 将挂起的工作项添加到工作批次。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to add pending work items to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于将挂起的工作项添加到工作批次。

trans-unit.source: The `workItem` object added to the batch is associated with `work`, an object that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface.
trans-unit.target: `workItem`对象添加到批处理与之关联`work`，实现的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>接口。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: Methods provided by this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> object will be called to handle the eventual commit of the `workItem`.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>对象将调用以处理的最终提交`workItem`。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: Services use this method to add pending work to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 服务使用此方法将挂起的工作添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object on which work is to be performed.
